summary: Both previously identified runtime-safety issues were addressed with appropriate guards and fallbacks, and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: POOL_PROVIDER_HINTS parsing assumes JSON is an object and can crash on non-object values
previous_issues_status.notes: Added validation to ensure parsed JSON is a non-array object before iterating, with fallback to defaults.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: resolvePoolId destructures ACCESS_LEVEL_POOLS without guarding invalid access levels
previous_issues_status.notes: Added runtime access-level guard with safe fallback to least-privileged tier.
